items.sentence: You don't know Tom as well as you think you do.
Tom isn't as easy to get along with as Mary is.
Tom wasn't sure whether Mary was joking or not.
Tom has the back door of his house nailed shut.
Everyone at the party was drunk except for Tom.
Tom has only been back in town for three weeks.
Tom has his notebook out and is ready to write.
Tom pointed at the tree in his neighbor's yard.
Tom plays tennis after school almost every day.
We simply can't just leave Tom here by himself.
